item.rel_title: Clinical Characteristics on 25 Discharged Patients with COVID-19 Virus Returning
item.rel_abs: Here we report the clinical features of 25 discharged patients with COVID-19 recovery. Our analysis indicated that there was a significant inverse correlation existed between serum D-Dimer level and the duration of antiviral treatment, while lymphocyte concentration significantly positively correlated with the duration of virus reversal.
item.rel_authors: Yuan, J.; Kou, S.; Liang, Y.; Zeng, J.; Pan, Y.; Liu, L.
